H0.text: They were born on the same day, which explains why identical twins usually look like each other.

H1.text: They have the same kinds of interests is the reason why identical twins usually look like each other.

H2.text: They inherited the same characteristics from their parents, which explains why identical twins usually look like each other.

H3.text: They were taught the same kinds of things at home, which explains why identical twins usually look like each other.

A4.text: Monozygotic twins are genetically nearly identical

A5.text: Monozygotic twins always have the same genotype
